name: Oops! There Goes the Time Link
name_original: Oops! There Goes the Time Link
description:
Play as two versions of the same time-traveller, who have caused a rift in time and must fix their time machine to save the day.

The younger scientist needs to shoot enemies, who will drop healthpacks and time machine components. The older scientist can then pick up the components and place them into the machine.

As you get closer together, more portals will open and enemies will spawn faster, letting you complete the game quicker but making it a lot harder.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Space: switch character.
  • Younger scientist: mouse to aim, LMB to shoot.
  • Older scientist: click and drag nearby cogs to move them.
  • ESC: Pause.
  • R: restart

Credits:

Fonts used: 

  • https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bangers
  • https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Concert+One

Artwork created in GIMP.

Available online and for Windows.
